body.instruction: Answer in ΔSpeak JSON only. Respond ONLY as a single JSON object exactly like: {"type":"COMMIT","body":{"topic":"ukraine/briefing","accept":true,"brief":"...","caption":"...","facts":["...","...","..."]}}
